jobs.description:
Job Title: Python Developer Data Extraction & Automation

Role Type: Hybrid
Location: Bengaluru (Bangalore)
Experience: 3+ years

Shift Timings: 6am to 3pm and 2pm to 11pm




About the Role

We are looking for a Python Developer with strong programming fundamentals to build and maintain automated tools for large-scale data extraction. You will design scrapers, work with APIs, transform raw data into usable formats, and ensure high reliability of our data pipelines. Your work will directly enable data-driven decisions by delivering accurate, clean, and consistent data at scale.

Key Responsibilities

Design, develop, and maintain automated data extraction and web scraping tools using Python.
Extract structured and unstructured data from websites, APIs, and online sources.
Clean, validate, and transform raw data into usable formats (CSV, JSON, SQL databases).
Ensure data accuracy, consistency, and completeness through validation and error handling.
Monitor scrapers for performance and quickly adapt to site/API changes.
Collaborate with analysts, engineers, and product teams to meet business data requirements.
Document code, processes, and maintain repositories (GitHub/GitLab).

Required Skills & Qualifications

Strong Python programming fundamentals (data structures, OOP, error handling, code optimization).
Hands-on experience with web scraping libraries and frameworks (Requests, BeautifulSoup, Scrapy, Selenium, Playwright).
Ability to write clean, scalable, and maintainable Python code.
Solid understanding of APIs (REST, JSON, XML) and HTTP protocols.
Experience with databases (SQL/NoSQL) and efficient query writing.
Proficiency in working with common data formats (CSV, JSON, Parquet).
Strong debugging, testing, and documentation skills.

Preferred Skills

Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) and serverless scraping.
Familiarity with ETL workflows and data pipeline tools (Apache Airflow, Luigi).
Knowledge of regular expressions, data normalization, and data quality checks.

Qualifications

Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field.
